workExperience.description:
• Responsible for the architecture decisions of the app as well as much of the implementation.
• Provide mentoring and engineering guidance for other members of the team, which consists of 5 other engineers.
• Communicate with other teams across the organization to improve and expand upon the public and internal api's. Implement new api's as needed, both public and internal.
• Create and monitor performance and observability dashboards for the mobile apps and push notification server.
• Responsible for maintaining and implementing features for the Scala service that governs push notifications and app logins.
• Monitor user feedback across channels and contribute to product/design decisions for the mobile app.
• Oversee the publishing process for app releases, including implementing changes in team process to allow for regular, bi-weekly updates to the Play Store.

• Planned, developed and tested the Android app for managing storefronts
• Deployed beta version of app and oversaw its release on Google Play within first 3 months of employment, and published release version 3 months later. Continued to develop and maintain app through company’s IPO process.
• Implemented app entirely using Kotlin, making use of libraries such as Coroutines, Retrofit, Firebase, charting, etc
• Monitored user feedback across channels and contribute to product/design decisions for the mobile app.
• Implemented new api endpoints on backend servers for mobile app to communicate with.
• Developed MacOS app (Swift) for internal testing used to facilitate creating trial stores and seeding them with dummy data
• Participated in code reviews for iOS development and Scala backend development

• Serve as lead developer on agile software team of 4 engineers
• Design primary architecture for app
• Implement SQLite databases using Room and Provider
• Develop custom libraries to be used in app
• Develop/maintain private Maven repository server
• Coordinate with partners to develop and integrate custom libraries
• Develop custom ROM for use with Android app
• Implement XMPP in both app and server
• Develop custom in-house analytics solution
• Develop accessibility features
• Develop desktop applications to serve as internal tools
• Develop Spring Boot api service for remote device management functionality

• Developed a website for surrogate mothers using Java Spring Boot/Thymeleaf, backed by a JDBC database implementation and the Kotlin language

• Provided development and support for a website and native mobile app (iOS and Android) to facilitate notifiying school officials (staff, admins, first responders) in the event of emergencies

• Developed a custom Wordpress plugin to schedule social media posts in the future to Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn (similar to Hootsuite, but for a custom Wordpress website)

• Developed a custom Wordpress plugin to control a IP-based webcam on a motorized track via a website interface.

• Created dynamic website with custom-developed Wordpress plugins and theming at www.churchphoneapps.com

• Created dynamic api allowing apps to communicate with server

• Developed approximately 18 iOS and Android apps for churches and non-profit organizations

• Developed the Custom.Church app for iOS and Android, allowing churches to instantly preview what their app
will look like and to manage all content from within the Custom.Church app interface.

• Created Restore Hope app – an Android app created for the Restore Hope organization whereby the organization’s volunteers can take food orders for clients and send the results to a printer. A custom webpage was built for the organization using HTML and PHP to allow food menu items to be created dynamically. This app was featured in the Tulsa World on April 6, 2015

• Developed approximately 13 apps for clients in Perth, Australia.

• Developed a sales lead tracking portal for administrative use at www.simplyapps.com.au

• Created multiple apis allowing apps to communicate with server

• Responsible for technology ministries, including social media strategy, website ministries, mobile ministries, etc.

• Performed public speaking through preaching opportunities from audiences ranging in size up to 450.

• Other duties as assigned.

• Audited or supervised auditing of all areas of financial statements, spending primary
emphasis on audit of revenue recognition, audit of footnotes to financial statements,
and review and supervision of associate auditors.

• Supervised, coached and assisted 4-6 associate auditors at a time

• Communicated recommendations to clients for improvement to accounting practices
and business processes.
